# Skid Row intro by WidowMaker

#### Written in 2007 for Windows.

[Original package](https://defacto2.net/f/b628987)

```basic

    PAGES( 1)="-------------------------------"
    PAGES( 2)="HIYA. AND WELCOME TO A"
    PAGES( 3)="CONVERSION OF A SKID ROW"
    PAGES( 4)="CRACK INTRO!"
    PAGES( 5)="I HAVE CHANGED ONE"
    PAGES( 6)="THING ABOUT THIS INTRO. AND"
    PAGES( 7)="IT IS THAT THE LINES ALL"
    PAGES( 8)="AUTOMATICALLY CENTER JUSTIFY"
    PAGES( 9)="BUT READ ON TO THE NEXT PAGE"
    PAGES(10)="-------------------------------"

'   PAGE 2:

    PAGES(11)="-------------------------------"
    PAGES(12)="  IF YOU WANT ALL THE LETTERS  "
    PAGES(13)=" TO LINE UP  LIKE THE ORIGINAL "
    PAGES(14)="   THEN YOU CAN JUST PAD THE   "
    PAGES(15)=" STRINGS OUT WITH BLANK SPACES "
    PAGES(16)=" AND IT WILL HAVE THAT EFFECT. "
    PAGES(17)=" ANYWAY IT HAS BEEN A FAST AND "
    PAGES(18)="  SIMPLE CONVERSION SO I HOPE  "
    PAGES(19)="  IT IS OK. - WIDOW MAKER E.D  "
    PAGES(20)="-------------------------------"

'   PAGE 3:

    PAGES(21)=""
    PAGES(22)="S K I D   R O W"
    PAGES(23)="THE LEADING FORCE"
    PAGES(24)=""
    PAGES(25)="IN 2007"
    PAGES(26)=""
    PAGES(27)=""
    PAGES(28)="SEE YOU NEXT TIME"
    PAGES(29)="-----------------"
    PAGES(30)=""
```
